mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RECEPTION ( PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, SYMPTOM, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{patientUuid}, #{doctorUuid}, #{symptom}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT R.UUID, R.PATIENT_UUID, R.DOCTOR_UUID, M.NAME, R.STATUS, R.TURN FROM TB_RECEPTION R JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.PATIENT_UUID = M.UUID WHERE R.DOCTOR_UUID = #{doctorUuid} AND R.STATUS IN ('RE01', 'RE03') AND R.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN CURDATE() AND CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY TURN;
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RECEPTION SET STATUS = #{updateStatus, typeHandler=com.emr.slgi.reception.typehandler.ReceptionStatusTypeHandler}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RECEPTION (PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, SYMPTOM) SELECT PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, SYMPTOM FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(STATUS) FROM TB_RECEPTION WHERE STATUS = 'RE03' AND DOCTOR_UUID = #{doctorUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RECEPTION SET STATUS = 'RE04' WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
